name: PLAYERUNKN1WN: Friendly Fire
description:
PLAYERUNKN1WN: Friendly fire is an action game in which you can play as one and in a circle of friends. The main idea of ​​the game is to survive as long as possible fighting off the crowd of beetles, while using a huge arsenal of weapons.

  • - Steel arms
  • - Blasters
  • - Shotguns
Each new level in the game is generated randomly, so you do not get bored of playing.

If you are ready to dive into the world of terrible creatures, collecting weapons and other things from boxes then this game is for you.
